page.title: 06FISHING BOATS ON WHALSAY
page.content: There are 118 men employed on fishing boats.There are 8 pursenetters, 10 whitefish boats,2 shellfish boats. The Research is a pursenetter, The Contest is a whitefish boat, The Corilda II is a shellfish boat. The driftnet,pursenet,seinenet and the trawlnet are all the nets fishing- boats use.The boats catch mackerel, herring,piltocks,codling, turbot, haddocks,whitings and skate. Some of the major places pursenetters go to land fish are Denmark,Norway, Stornaway,Cornwall,Peterhead and Lerwick.Most of the whitefish boats land fish at Scalloway and Lerwick. The names of all the fishing boats are the Research,Zephyr,Azalea,Serene, Antares,Charisma,Aquilla,Adenia, Concord,Contest,Flourish,Athena,Korona ,Starina,Langdale,Fortuna,Comrades, Harvest Home,Lizanne,Corilda II. {
